scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, crowned and seated on a wooden throne, nurses the Christ Child. She wears a blue robe and a crown, while the child is dressed in a patterned yellow garment and also wears a small crown. The background is a deep blue with gold stars, suggesting a celestial setting. To the right and left of the throne are decorative panels with gold patterns on a red background. The floor is tiled in a green and white checkerboard pattern. The scene is framed by an arched border with floral and geometric motifs.
